example[0]: I’ve decided to shave off my beard.
definition[1]: to remove very thin pieces from the surface of something, using a knife or other cutting tool
example[1]: I had to shave a few millimetres off the bottom of the door to make it shut.
definition[2]: if you shave a small amount off something such as a price or a record, you make the price slightly smaller or the record time slightly shorter
example[2]: She shaved half a second off the world record.
